content: marker and join to work in the round work from the chart or written instructions if your mc is dark start with round 1 if your mc is light start with round 19 continue to work from the chart or written version work 6 bands stopping after round 36 for dark mc round 18 for light mc with mc knit one round purl one round + bind off knitwise or purlwise whichever you prefer © ashcroft-hempsall 2020 - for personal non-commercial use only op knit 3 be sure to check page 2 to see which round to start on there are different instructions depending on the version you choose © ashcroft-hempsall 2020 - for personal non-commercial use only op knit 4 written version of instructions be sure to check page 2 to see which round to start on there are different instructions depending on the option you choose slip all sts purlwise with yarn in back round 1 - dark knit all sts 30 sts per repeat round 2 - dark k15 p15 round 3 - light k3 sl1 pw k7 sl1 pw k6 sl1 pw k1 x 4 sl1 pw k3 round 4 - light k3 sl1 pw k7 sl1 pw k3 p3 sl1 pw p1 x 4 sl1 pw p3 round 5 - dark k19 sl1 pw k1 x 3 sl1 pw k4 round 6 - dark k15 p4 sl1 pw p1 x 3 sl1 pw p4 rounds 7 - 10 repeat rounds 3 - 6 rounds 11 - 14 repeat rounds 3 - 6 rounds 15-16 repeat rounds 3 - 4 round 17 - dark knit all sts round 18 - dark k15 p15 round 19 - light knit all sts round 20 - light p15 k15 round 21 - dark k3 sl1 pw k1 x 4 sl1 pw k6 sl1 pw k7 sl1 pw k3 round 22 - dark p3 sl1 pw p1 x 4 sl1 pw p3 k3 sl1 pw k7 sl1 pw k3 round 23 - light k4 sl1 pw k1 x 3 sl1 pw k19 round 24 - light p4 sl1 pw p1 x 3 sl1 pw p4 k15 rounds 25 - 28 repeat rounds 21 - 24 rounds 29 - 32 repeat rounds 21 - 24 rounds 33 - 34 repeat rounds 21 - 22 round 35 - light knit all sts round 36 - light p15 k15 © ashcroft-hempsall 2020 - for personal non-commercial use only
